venue: Get More Bookings for Your Venue Today !
name: English
paragraf_right: Log in and catch up with the latest events.
about_text: Sportify is a modern online platform that connects sports enthusiasts with sports facilities. Whether you're looking to rent a field, pitch, court, ring, or rink, Sportify makes it easy to find and book the perfect venue for your sports event. With user accounts, you can manage your bookings, invite others to your events, and get answers to your questions about the facilities. Facility owners can also create accounts, register their venues, and provide helpful information to potential customers.
terms_of_use_text: These Terms of Use  govern your access to and use of the Sportify Bosna web application, including any related websites, mobile applications, content, and services. By accessing or using Sportify, you agree to be bound by these Terms. If you do not agree to these Terms, you must not use Sportify.
terms_of_use_text_1: 1.1. Age Requirement: By using Sportify, you represent and warrant that you are at least 16 years old. If you are under the age of 16, you must obtain consent from a parent or guardian before using Sportify.
terms_of_use_text_2: 2.1. Registration: To access certain features of Sportify, you may need to create a user account. You must provide accurate, complete, and up-to-date information during the registration process. You are solely responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials and for all activities that occur under your account.
terms_of_use_text_3: 2.2. Account Security: You are responsible for ensuring the security of your account and preventing unauthorized access. If you suspect any unauthorized use of your account or any other breach of security, you must notify Sportify immediately.
terms_of_use_text_4: 3.1. Compliance with Laws: You agree to use Sportify in compliance with all applicable laws, regulations, and third-party rights. You must not engage in any activity that violates the rights of others or disrupts the proper functioning of Sportify.
terms_of_use_text_5: 3.2. Prohibited Activities: You must not use Sportify for any unlawful, harmful, or fraudulent purposes. Prohibited activities include, but are not limited to: uploading malicious content, transmitting spam or unsolicited messages, impersonating others, and engaging in unauthorized commercial activities.
terms_of_use_text_6: 4.1. Ownership: Sportify and its associated content, including but not limited to logos, trademarks, text, graphics, and images, are owned by Sportify or its licensors and are protected by intellectual property laws. You agree not to use, reproduce, modify, or distribute any copyrighted material without obtaining explicit permission from the respective owners.
terms_of_use_text_7: 5.1. Disclaimer: Sportify provides the platform on an 'as is' and 'as available' basis. We make no representations or warranties regarding the accuracy, reliability, or availability of the platform. You use Sportify at your own risk.
terms_of_use_text_8: 5.2. Limitation of Liability: To the fullest extent permitted by law, Sportify and its affiliates, directors, officers, employees, and agents shall not be liable for any direct, indirect, incidental, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or in connection with your use of Sportify.
terms_of_use_text_9: Sportify reserves the right to modify or update these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of any material changes through the Sportify platform or by other means. Your continued use of Sportify after the effective date of the modified Terms constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.
terms_of_use_text_10: Sportify may, at its discretion, terminate or suspend your access to Sportify for any reason, including violation of these Terms. Upon termination, you must cease all use of Sportify and any associated materials.
terms_of_use_text_11: These Terms shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Bosnia and Herzegovina. Any dispute arising out of or in connection with these Terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Bosnia and Herzegovina.
terms_of_use_text_12: If you have any questions, concerns, or inquiries regarding these Terms, please contact us.
privacy_policy_text: Sportify is committed to protecting the privacy and personal information of its users. This Privacy Policy outlines how we collect, use, disclose, and protect the information provided by users of the Sportify web application and related services. By using Sportify, you consent to the practices described in this Privacy Policy.
privacy_policy_text_1: 1.1. Personal Information: When you create a user account on Sportify, we may collect personal information such as your name, email address, and contact details. This information is necessary for the proper functioning of the platform and to provide you with a personalized experience.
privacy_policy_text_2: 1.2. Venue Information: If you are a facility owner, we may collect information about your venue, including its name, location, amenities, and contact details. This information is used to help users find and book your venue for their sports events.
privacy_policy_text_3: 1.3. Usage Data: We may collect data about your use of the Sportify platform, such as the pages you visit, the features you use, and the actions you take. This information helps us improve our services and enhance the user experience.
privacy_policy_text_4: 2.1. Personalization: We may use the information collected to personalize your experience on Sportify, including suggesting relevant venues, events, or services based on your interests and preferences.
privacy_policy_text_5: 2.2. Bookings and Communication: If you make bookings through Sportify, we will use your information to facilitate the booking process and communicate with you regarding your reservations. We may also send you important updates, notifications, and promotional offers related to your bookings or the Sportify platform.
privacy_policy_text_6: 2.3. Venue Promotion: If you are a facility owner, we may use your venue information to promote your venue to potential customers, including displaying it in search results and sharing it with relevant users looking for sports facilities.
privacy_policy_text_7: 2.4. Analytics and Improvements: We may use the collected data for analytical purposes to understand user behavior, trends, and preferences. This helps us improve our services, develop new features, and enhance the overall functionality of Sportify.
privacy_policy_text_8: 3.1. With Your Consent: We may share your personal information with your explicit consent or as necessary to fulfill your specific requests, such as sharing your contact details with other users for event coordination.
privacy_policy_text_9: 3.2. Service Providers: We may engage trusted third-party service providers to assist us in operating and maintaining the Sportify platform. These service providers will have access to your information only to perform specific tasks on our behalf and are obligated to keep it confidential.
privacy_policy_text_10: 3.3. Legal Requirements: We may disclose your information if required by law, regulation, or legal process, or if we believe it is necessary to protect the rights, property, or safety of Sportify, its users, or others.
privacy_policy_text_11: Sportify takes reasonable measures to safeguard the information collected from users. However, no method of transmission over the internet or electronic storage is 100% secure. We cannot guarantee the absolute security of your information, and you provide it at your own risk.
privacy_policy_text_12: 5.1. Account Management: You can update, correct, or delete your account information by accessing your account settings on Sportify. Please note that certain information may be retained for legal or legitimate business purposes.
privacy_policy_text_13: 5.2. Communication Preferences: You can choose to opt out of receiving promotional communications from Sportify by following the unsubscribe instructions provided in the communication or by contacting us directly.
privacy_policy_text_14: Sportify is not intended for use by individuals under the age of 16. We do not knowingly collect personal information from children. If we become aware that we have inadvertently collected personal information from a child, we will take steps to delete it promptly.
privacy_policy_text_15: Sportify may update this Privacy Policy from time to time to reflect changes in our practices or legal obligations. We will notify users of any material changes through the Sportify platform or by other means. Your continued use of Sportify after the effective date of the updated Privacy Policy constitutes your acceptance of the revised terms.
privacy_policy_text_16: If you have any questions, concerns, or inquiries about this Privacy Policy or Sportify's privacy practices, please contact us.
become_a_partner_paragraf: Expand your reach, connect with new customers, and grow your business.
contact_us_text: If you have any questions or need assistance, please feel free to reach out to us.
question_1: How do I create an account on Sportify?
answer_1: Click on the 'Sign Up' button(top right corner of your screen) which will lead you to the Sign Up page. There you will need to fill in all the required fields and click on 'Sign Up'. You will automatically be logged in to your account.
answer_2: We help you find occurring sports events in your area to participate in, make reservations at local venues or to register your own venues.
question_3: How do I make a reservation for a venue?
answer_3: Visit the Sportify website or open the mobile application. If you don't have an account yet, create one by signing up with your email address and setting a password. After signing in, you will be redirected to the homepage or dashboard. On the homepage or in the navigation menu, look for the 'Find Venues' or 'Search Venues' option and click on it. Enter your desired location or browse the available venues in your area. Use search filters to narrow down the options based on the type of sports facility, date, time, amenities, or other preferences. Review the listed venues and select the one that suits your needs by clicking on it. Detailed information about the venue will be displayed, including its amenities, availability, price, and additional options. Click on the 'Book' or 'Book Now' button to proceed with the reservation. Confirm the reservation details, including the date, time, and any costs or fees involved. Once the reservation is confirmed, you will receive a confirmation email or notification with the details of your reservation, including the venue address, reservation reference number, and any other relevant information.
question_4: Can I make changes to my reservation once it's been confirmed?
answer_4: Currently, it is not possible to change your reservation.
question_5: How can I contact the venue owner if I have questions or concerns?
answer_5: Log in to your Sportify account on the website or mobile app. Find the details of the property you have questions or concerns about. It can be a property page or a reservation you have already made. Look for the contact information provided by the property owner. This may include a phone number, email address, or contact form. If a phone number is available, you can call the property owner directly to discuss your questions or concerns. If an email address is available, you can send an email explaining your questions or problems.Alternatively, if there is a contact form, fill in the required information and send a message through the form.Explain your questions or concerns clearly and concisely in the communication, providing all relevant details such as the booking number or specific dates/times.Be patient and wait for some time for the owner of the object to respond to your inquiry. They will contact you with the necessary information or assistance.
question_6: Is there a limit to how in advance I can make a venue reservation?
answer_6: Facility Rules: Each facility may have its own rules regarding the time frame for advance reservations. Some properties may allow reservations up to a year in advance, while others may have shorter time frames, such as a few weeks or months.Popular properties: Popular properties or those that are in high demand may have stricter reservation policies. They may require reservations to be made well in advance due to limited availability, especially during peak seasons or for popular sporting events. Special Events: If you wish to reserve a facility for a special event, such as a tournament or major sporting event, the facility may have specific guidelines regarding when reservations can be made. I can prioritize earlier bookings to ensure proper planning and organization. Platform restrictions: If you use the Sportify platform or a similar online booking platform, there may be restrictions on the booking time frame imposed by the platform itself. These restrictions can vary, so it's important to check the platform's specific terms and conditions.
